title: Privacy Policies - Panopto Video Platform
content:
• Please click here to see the Panopto Website Visitor Privacy Policy
    This privacy policy applies to individuals who interact with any of the Panopto websites.
  • Please click here to see the Panopto Authorised User Privacy Policy
    This privacy policy applies to individuals who use any Panopto products or services.
textContent:
Please click here to see the Panopto Website Visitor Privacy Policy
This privacy policy applies to individuals who interact with any of the Panopto websites.
Please click here to see the Panopto Authorised User Privacy Policy
This privacy policy applies to individuals who use any Panopto products or services.
excerpt: Privacy policies for the Panopto.com website and the Panopto video platform. The policies provide information on how we collect and process information when you use our website and video platform.
